N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-2.2 - Units of Radioactivity

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, activity is expressed in
the special unit of curies (Ci) or in the SI unit of becquerels (Bq), or their
multiples, or disintegrations (transformations) per unit of time. (a) One becquerel = one disintegration per
